Trade/Device Name(s): Kurin PIV18 Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology, includes detachable, pressure-rated, 6" (152mm) microbore extension set
M-PIV18 - Kurin PIV18 Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology (with Biomerieux Shield Blood Collection Holder)
D-PIV18 – Kurin PIV18 Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology (with BD Vacutainer Blood Collection Holder)
T-PIV18 - Kurin PIV18 Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology (with Short Saf-T Blood Collection Holder)
Regulation Name(s): Tubes, Vials, Systems, Serum Separators, Blood Collection
Specimen Container(s): Blood collection holder (Biomerieux Shield, BD Vacutainer, Short Saf-T Holder)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Blood collection via flexible tubing and blood lock mechanism
Methodologies: Automated discard volume method (DVM) for blood draw
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Kurin PIV18 Blood Culture Collection Set with Kurin Lock Technology, a sterile, single-use blood collection and infusion set for peripheral IV catheter connection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to connect to a short peripheral catheter to obtain initial blood draw; when disconnected, the pressure-rated extension set is intended for use with infusion systems to administer IV fluids, medications, blood, and blood products, and may be safely used with power injectors up to 325 psi.
